content:
@Joshua Nelson Hey, I was going to backport #83678 and I noticed you made the comment "FWIW I see this as low-risk - it just makes the URL look uglier". It seems like it is more than just the URL, right? Like the docs now say the keyword is SelfTy which seems wrong? I just wanted to double check that was understood.

image.png
I mean I don't like it either but I don't see a better alternative in the short term :/
Both keywords documented on the same page maybe? Not sure if a good idea though...
Or we could consider adding a rustc_attrs attribute (can rustdoc use that feature gate?) that would allow us to only change the URL.
